Sr. Creative Manager, Production at PetSmart
June 21, 2012, Shane R. was senior to Kim but didn’t manage directly

Shane is insightful, forward thinking and a tremdous motivator for our teams to do the best work possible for our stores and customers. Since arriving at PetSmart and through Shane's vision, our stores have undergone a true metamorphosis in becoming a first class environment for people to shop for their pets.  And this is definitely reflected in customer feedback as well as our stock price!  He is a valued mentor and leader.

Doug Anderson
Creative, Senior Copywriter at Zion & Zion
October 31, 2010, Shane R. was senior to Doug but didn’t manage directly

During my time working at PetSmart, providing concept and messaging, Shane has always provided clear, direct, honest and constructive feedback to his team. It's obvious that Shane's engine is powered by his passion for creativity. His creative direction and strategic insight dovetail excellently, positioning his team with exactly what they need to impress clients and meet expectations.Shane separates himself from many others with his ability to inspire his team to think differently and dig deep to develop the best work possible. It's not possible to get bored or stagnant around Shane; his energy is contagious.

Scott Moore
Global SVP of Marketing & Creative Content at Mood Media
July 10, 2015, Shane R. was a client of Scott’s

Scott is extremely talented in understanding how to bring your company's strategy and vision to life.  He has a unique combination of creativity, maturity, and business practicality that is refreshing in this day and age. He's a great listener, understands and accepts limitations around budget and/or timing, but still managed to deliver all projects on time. He has always provided clear, direct, honest and constructive feedback to us as clients, which in turn made the relationship more enjoyable and efficient. It's obvious that Scott's engine is powered by his passion for strategy and teamwork. His strategic insight dovetails excellently, positioning his team with exactly what they need to impress clients and meet their expectations. One thing I really enjoyed about Scott was that he knew how to make those around him have purpose beyond their titles. I feel very lucky to have worked with Scott and can only hope we interact professionally in the future once again.

summary: Have been lucky to have experienced many versions of my skill set across several professions. I continue to see each one as stepping stone to any new adventure.   I thrive in environments that let me paint the corporate walls orange. I enjoy the art of Creative Coaching you and your self brand.  We all want to be valued for our unique skill sets.  I love seeing someone realize their potential and "BRAND YOU".
